channel.title: CVE Feed for TeamViewer -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TeamViewer -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-7481|2024-09-25T15:16:30.827Z -- teamviewer -- remote%20full%20client
item.description: Improper verification of cryptographic signature during installation of a Printer driver via the TeamViewer_service.exe component of TeamViewer Remote Clients prior version 15.58.4 for Windows allows an attacker with local unprivileged access on a Windows system to elevate their privileges and install drivers.

item.title: CVE-2024-7479|2024-09-25T15:13:29.437Z -- teamviewer -- remote%20full%20client
item.description: Improper verification of cryptographic signature during installation of a VPN driver via the TeamViewer_service.exe component of TeamViewer Remote Clients prior version 15.58.4 for Windows allows an attacker with local unprivileged access on a Windows system to elevate their privileges and install drivers.

item.title: CVE-2024-6053|2024-08-28T16:30:58.925Z -- teamviewer -- meeting
item.description: Improper access control in the clipboard synchronization feature in TeamViewer Full Client prior version 15.57 and TeamViewer Meeting prior version 15.55.3 can lead to unintentional sharing of the clipboard with the current presenter of a meeting.

item.title: CVE-2024-2451|2024-08-01T19:11:53.533Z -- teamviewer -- remote%20%28full%20client%29
item.description: Improper fingerprint validation in the TeamViewer Client (Full & Host) prior Version 15.54 for Windows and macOS allows an attacker with administrative user rights to further elevate privileges via executable sideloading.

item.title: CVE-2024-2451|2024-07-24T17:59:43.200Z -- teamviewer -- remote%20%28full%20client%29
item.description: Improper fingerprint validation in the TeamViewer Client (Full & Host) prior Version 15.54 for Windows and macOS allows an attacker with administrative user rights to further elevate privileges via executable sideloading.

item.title: CVE-2024-2451|2024-05-28T14:27:25.918Z -- teamviewer -- remote%20%28full%20client%29
item.description: Improper fingerprint validation in the TeamViewer Client (Full & Host) prior Version 15.54 for Windows and macOS allows an attacker with administrative user rights to further elevate privileges via executable sideloading.

item.title: CVE-2024-6053|2024-08-28T17:47:14.592Z -- teamviewer -- meeting
item.description: Improper access control in the clipboard synchronization feature in TeamViewer Full Client prior version 15.57 and TeamViewer Meeting prior version 15.55.3 can lead to unintentional sharing of the clipboard with the current presenter of a meeting.

item.description: Improper verification of cryptographic signature during installation of a VPN driver via the TeamViewer_service.exe component of TeamViewer Remote Clients prior version 15.58.4 for Windows allows an attacker with local unprivileged access on a Windows system to elevate their privileges and install drivers.
